description: This file defines a responsive scaffold widget for Flutter applications, adapting navigation UI based on screen size (small, medium, large). It includes classes for navigation destinations and the main adaptive scaffold widget that switches between BottomNavigationBar, NavigationRail, and a Drawer layout.

classes.name: AdaptiveScaffoldDestination
classes.description: Represents a navigation destination with an icon and label, and an optional selected icon.

classes.name: AdaptiveScaffold
classes.description: A Flutter widget that provides a responsive layout with different navigation patterns depending on screen size: BottomNavigationBar, NavigationRail, or Drawer.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree, selecting the appropriate navigation layout based on screen size.
